DESCRI

decision_conditions: If heritage assets of archaeological interest are identified by stage 1 (the details approved by this consent to discharge condition 3 of 21/01935/CREG3) then for those parts of the site which have archaeological interest a stage 2 WSI shall be submitted to and approved by the local planning authority in writing. For land that is included within the stage 2 WSI, no demolition/development shall take place other than in accordance with the agreed stage 2 WSI which shall include:A. The statement of significance and research objectives, the programme and methodology of site investigation and recording and the nomination of a competent person(s) or organisation to undertake the agreed works B. The programme for post-investigation assessment and subsequent analysis, publication & dissemination and deposition of resulting material. This part of the condition shall not be discharged until these elements have been fulfilled in accordance with the programme set out in the stage 2 WSI.Reason: To avoid harm to and record assets of archaeological significance in accordance with policy HC1 of the London Plan 2021and Policy DM12 of the LDF Core Adopted April 2012
